degree of success. Thus, Turing’s prediction seems false (and not even
close to true). Does this show that Turing’s main argument is fallacious?
Why or why not?
3.  Turing claims that Jefferson’s argument from consciousness lands him in
solipsism. Reconstruct and evaluate this reductio ad absurdumrefutation.
How could Jefferson best reply? Is this reply adequate? Why or why not?
